attributes.action: REPEAL THE CLOSED SEASON FOR ANGLING ON ALL INLAND WATERWAYS EXCLUDING SSSI's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "REPEAL THE CLOSED SEASON FOR ANGLING ON ALL INLAND WATERWAYS EXCLUDING SSSI's."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13228.asp

Prime Minister's Office
